name: Game of Color
description:
What is this game?
This is a little simulation game about the Game of Life with colors.
It works like the Game of Life, but with colors!

Current features

  • Make cool patterns to play with.
  • Choose between two different viewing modes.
  • Make cool pixel art with the background.
  • Speed up or slow down the game.

Controls

  • P: Pause/ Resume
  • O: Toggle colored pixels around black pixels
  • B: Toggle background
  • I: Toggle colored pixel trail
  • C: Reset everything
  • L: Reset all cells
  • M: Reset background
  • R: Change mode
  • Left arrow: Slow the game down
  • Right arrow: Speed up the game
  • Left mouse: Add cells
  • Right mouse: Remove cells
